text: Overland Adventure: The Story of the 1954 Redex Reliability Trial is a 1954 documentary directed by Ken G. Hall about the 1954 Redex Reliability Trial. It appears to have also been known as Tough Assignment. ==References== ==External links== *Overland Adventure at Australian Screen Online *Overland Adventure at IMDb *Overland Adventure at National Film and Sound Archive Category:Australian documentary films Category:Australian films
title: Overland Adventure
